snippet.title: Review: Theatrhythm Final Fantasy Is Game Music Nostalgia At Its Best
snippet.description: Jon Brodkin writes "Few game series other than Final Fantasy have consistently provided epic adventures for 25 yearsâ€”and perhaps no company outside of Nintendo capitalizes on its history like Square Enix. In its latest attempt to merge the best of past and present into one experience, Square Enix has produced the music game Theatrhythm Final Fantasy for the Nintendo 3DS. Joining Guitar Hero-style mechanics, 3D perspective, RPG-like character building and battling, and the rich music catalog of the Final Fantasy franchise, Theatrhythm is impressive, enjoyable, and one of the best examples of why it's worth owning a 3DS and that wacky stylus." Read below for the rest of Jon's review.
